title: Wall of Thorns

nded by Entangling vines. Creatures can move through the wall, but they take 7~56 Piercing damage per turn, and their movement speed is quartered. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw:
